attributes.action: For the Government to consider the effects to normal life if a zero level alcohol is implimented
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone agrees that drink driving is wrong and the book should be thrown at those that do. That is why every weekend millions of people get taxis home, stay at friends, walk etc. A zero level alcohol ban would mean that no one would be able to have a few drinks in the night and drive the next day just in case they have a non dangerous but minimal level of alcohol in their system. This would effect everyone who has ever had a drink

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
